metadata.title: New Body Line 2 - A Family Where the Common Goal is to Improve
metadata.description: Gym in Cavallino-Treporti with expert staff, fitness and dance courses, and a welcoming environment for your wellbeing.

hero.title: A Family Where
hero.titleAccent: the Common Goal is to Improve
hero.description: At New Body Line 2 you will find trained staff ready to guide you on whatever path you choose, helping you understand the importance of fitness and personal wellbeing.

features.title: About Us
features.subtitle: Welcome to your gym in Cavallino-Treporti!

equipment.title: More Than a Gym
equipment.description: Located at Via Grisolera 33, a place where health, wellbeing and passion for movement come together.

trainers.title: Welcoming Environment
trainers.description: A professional and dynamic environment, designed to help you reach your personal goals.

atmosphere.title: A Community
atmosphere.description: A staff always ready to welcome you with a smile: your progress is our top priority.

hours.title: Your Wellbeing
hours.description: Every detail is designed for your wellbeing. Come visit us, we're waiting for you!

courses.title: Our Courses
courses.subtitle: All courses are designed to fit your needs and goals! Discover our wide range and join the path that's right for you.
courses.danceSubtitle: Discover your passion for dance: our courses are waiting for you! Our two dance studios are ready just for you!

pilates.title: Pilates
pilates.description: Rediscover balance, strength and flexibility with Pilates, a workout that unites body and mind through controlled and precise movements. Ideal for improving posture and muscle tone.

kickboxing.title: Kickboxing
kickboxing.description: Release stress and improve endurance, strength and coordination in a dynamic course combining boxing and martial arts techniques. Also available for kids: a fun and safe activity teaching discipline and self-control.

circuit.title: Circuit Training
circuit.description: Get a full workout with our circuits, combining aerobic and resistance exercises to improve strength, speed and agility.

lowImpact.title: Low Impact Structural Circuit
lowImpact.description: A gentle but effective path, designed for those who want to train without overloading their joints. Perfect for recovery or for those who prefer a less intense approach.

spinning.title: Spinning
spinning.description: Hop on the saddle and pedal your way to peak fitness! Our spinning sessions suit all levels, improving cardiovascular endurance and burning calories.

posturale.title: Postural Gymnastics
posturale.description: Take care of your body with targeted exercises to correct posture, improve balance and relieve muscle tension. Ideal for those suffering from chronic pain or wanting to prevent future issues.

propedeutica.title: Dance Basics
propedeutica.description: The perfect introduction for the little ones: a playful and educational experience that develops coordination, musicality and love for dance.

modernDance.title: Modern Dance
modernDance.description: For those who want to move to the rhythm of the latest trends: technique and creativity blend into dynamic and engaging choreographies.

hipHop.title: Hip-Hop
hipHop.description: Unleash your energy and style! Our course will immerse you in urban culture, teaching you spectacular and unique moves.

choreography.title: Choreography Workshop
choreography.description: Collaborate in creating unique choreographies, expressing your personality and improving your expressive and artistic abilities.

personalTraining.title: Personal Training
personalTraining.subtitle: Work one-on-one with our elite trainers to achieve your fitness goals faster
personalTraining.heroDescription: Get personalized attention, customized workout plans, and dedicated support from our certified personal trainers.

trainers.title: Meet Our Expert Trainers
trainers.subtitle: Choose the perfect trainer for your goals

booking.title: Book Your Session
booking.noSlots: No available slots for this date
booking.bookingSuccessMessage: Your personal training session has been booked. Check your email for confirmation.

customized.title: Customized Plans
customized.description: Workouts tailored specifically to your goals and fitness level

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: Stay motivated with a dedicated trainer pushing you to succeed

faster.title: Faster Results
faster.description: Achieve your goals more efficiently with expert guidance

technique.title: Proper Technique
technique.description: Learn correct form to maximize results and prevent injury

location.title: Visit Our Gym
location.subtitle: Find our address, opening hours and directions to plan your visit

dashboard.title: Booking Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage Personal Training Sessions
dashboard.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?

footer.tagline: A family where the common goal is to improve.

manage.title: Manage Booking
manage.subtitle: Look up your booking by ID and email to view or modify it.
manage.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking? This action cannot be undone.
manage.cancelled: Your booking has been cancelled successfully.
manage.noSlots: No available slots for this date.
manage.changesLocked: Changes are locked. The appointment is less than 12 hours away.
manage.enterIdAndEmail: Please enter your booking ID and email.
